Indonesia through the eyes of tourists

A country of pristine jungles and rich eco-systems. Country of living fire-breathing volcanoes. A country of black, white powder and even pink beaches. Homeland of contemporaries of dinosaurs - Komodo dragons. A cozy home for different tribes - from cannibals in the east to the closed peoples of the mountains and plains, which are not so easy to visit!

Indonesia is one of the vibrant and distinctive regions of Southeast Asia. An archipelago consisting of thousands of islands, each of which has its own unique character, amazingly original and vibrant! Time travel is a trip to Indonesia, because it is not for nothing that the millions of megacities of the western part are adjacent to the primitive way of life.
